bob Reynolds Sports EditorJanuary  

The Ohio Valley Conference announced its three awards on Tuesday Afternoon and Eastern Kentucky players earned two of them PERIOD

Michaela Hunter won OVC Player of the Week this week and averaged  points a game in the Eastern Kentucky two road wins last week PERIOD She recorded a careerhigh  points in the Colonels double overtime win at Tennessee Tech which is the most points ever scored by an OVC player this season PERIOD

That was also the third most ever points by an Eastern Kentucky player in a single game PERIOD

Hunter was 15of29 from the floor and 5of7 from the free throw line in the game against the Golden Eagles PERIOD

At Murray State she scored  points and corralled eight rebounds PERIOD

Also from Eastern Kentucky Shameekia Murray won Newcomer of the Week nearly averaging a doubledouble in Colonel wins this past week PERIOD

She scored her first career doubledouble at Murray State with a teambest  points and a careerhigh  rebounds PERIOD

In the win over Tennessee Tech she added  points and seven rebounds PERIOD

Sally McCabe from Belmont won Freshman of the Week and scored  points per game in the Belmont two wins last week PERIOD

Against Jacksonville State she played a careerhigh  minutes and scored  points PERIOD

At Tennessee State she led all players with  points on  percent shooting from the floor PERIOD



TennesseeMartin leads in most of the statistical categories for the OVC PERIOD

The Skyhawks lead in scoring offense at . points per game and are allowing the least amount of points in the conference with  per game PERIOD

The Skyhawks are shooting over  percent from the floor and  percent from the 3point line which both lead the conference PERIOD

Also UTMartin is averaging . 3point shots made per game PERIOD

Ashia Jones leads the conference in scoring and field goal percentage with . points per game and she is shooting . percent from the floor PERIOD

Eastern Illinois is tied for sixth place in the conference with a record of  and is leading the OVC in defensive rebounds and that is with the help of senior forward Sabina Oroszova PERIOD

She is leading the conference in rebounds with averaging . per game in the first eight conference games PERIOD Also sophomore forward Erica Brown is averaging . rebounds per game PERIOD

Brown also leads the conference in blocked shots with two per game PERIOD
